section.title: Install packages
section.para: On any host that is meant to be part of a Pacemaker cluster, you must first establish cluster communications through the Corosync messaging layer. This involves installing the following packages (and their dependencies, which your package manager will normally install automatically):

listitem.para: pacemaker (Note that the crm shell should be downloaded separately.)
fence-agents (Fedora only; all other distributions use fencing agents from cluster-glue)
